content.value:
We have FREE Breakfast for all our private rooms. Located smack in the middle of the cool new city center of Cali - the sector Santa Monica - you find Casa Blanca Hostel. Within minutes on foot from Casa Blanca you find everything from shopping centers supermarkets, banks, airlines and restaurants, fast food, local food, bar, clubs to bike mechanics and bus terminal.

Casa Blanca is the cleanest hostel you’ll ever find, with its hotel style service for a hostel style budget.

You find us in a newly renovated house located smack in the middle of the cool new city center of Cali. VERY safe and quiet area, but still close to the famous Sixth Avenue and the bus station.

Payment upon arrival by cash, credit cards, debit cards. This property may pre-authorise your card before arrival
Cancellation policy: 48 h before arrival date.

Taxes included.
Breakfast not included in Dormitories.

General:

-No curfew.
-No smoking inside the hostel. Quiet at 11 PM
-Child friendly.

description.description: We have 3 private rooms with bathroom, one with a fan and two with AC, dorms of different sizes,, free high speed Wi-Fi, guest computers, 3-hour laundry service, English speaking airport service, credit cards accepted, big kitchen, dining area and living room with 42′ flat screen, 24-h reception, outdoor patio and lots of information on tours and sites to see. FREE Group Salsa Class with Salsa Professionals. If you like to arrange longer and more advanced course, we have a highly recommended salsa teacher for you.
